message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV 

This paper proposes a new text representation scheme for classification by clustering words according to their latent semantics. This falls under the sub-category of natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR), which is cs.CL. Additionally, the paper uses visualization analysis to show statistical clustering results, which could also fall under computer vision (cs.CV). The method also involves composing words together to strengthen the semantic expression, which could be related to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
